name: Network Traffic
description: The network traffic object describes network data traffic.

direction_id.description: The direction of the network traffic.

1.description: Inbound network traffic. The traffic was originated from the Internet or outside network, destined for services on the inside network.
1.name: Inbound

2.description: Outbound network traffic. The traffic was was originated from inside the network, destined for services on the Internet or outside network.
2.name: Outbound

3.description: Local network traffic on the same endpoint.
3.name: Local

4.description: Internal network traffic between two endpoints inside network.
4.name: Internal

5.description: External network traffic between two endpoints on the Internet or outside the network.
5.name: External
